name: Kashi Breakfast Cereal, Organic, Whole Grain, Autumn Wheat, 18oz Box (1 Box)
short_description: Deliciously crunchy and full of cozy autumn flavors, the whole family will enjoy this low fat cereal in the morning or any time of day
Simply made from 3 ingredients, wake up to tasty, wholesome cereal; These sweet shredded wheat biscuits contain fiber to satisfy
Excellent source of fiber; 53g whole grains per serving; Vegan; Organic; Non-GMO Project Verified; Kosher Pareve; Contains wheat ingredients
An easy breakfast or on the go snack; Simply delicious, both kids and adults love the taste of this fall cereal all year long
Includes 1, 18oz box of Kashi Autumn Wheat breakfast cereal; Packaged for freshness and great taste
product_description: Cozy up with autumn flavor! Kashi Autumn Wheat cereal is made with hearty, whole grain biscuits and the perfect amount of sweetness the whole family will love. This organic breakfast cereal contains 7g of protein (5% daily value) and 7g of fiber per serving. Vegan and Non-GMO Project Verified, it combines delicious, high-quality ingredients that deliver tasty nutrition and fiber to satisfy. It’s a quick and easy way to brighten your morning; Pack reusable baggies of this fiber cereal in your backpack for a tasty treat between meals. It’ll put a smile on your face and help keep you going. Simply made from 3 ingredients, each nourishing bite of this cereal packs in autumn flavors you can feel good about. Kids and adults alike love the shredded wheat biscuits in each spoonful with your favorite milk. Whether you’re starting or ending your day, Kashi Autumn Wheat cereal is a wholesome choice.

name: Great Grains Cranberry Almond Crunch Breakfast Cereal for Adults, Dried Cranberries and Almonds, Made with Whole Grain, Non-GMO, Heart Healthy, 14 OZ Box
short_description: CRANBERRY ALMOND CEREAL: One 14 oz box of Great Grains Cranberry Almond Crunch Cereal features a crunchy breakfast cereal made with whole grains for lasting energy

GOOD SOURCE OF FIBER: Cereal is non-GMO project verified and a good source of fiber for daily nutrition. It is made with crispy wheat flakes, real cranberries, granola clusters, and almonds for that nutty flavor

HEART HEALTHY CEREAL: Contains 38g of whole grains per serving. Diets rich in whole grain foods and other plant foods, and low in saturated fat and cholesterol, may help reduce the risk of heart disease
VERSATILE ENJOYMENT: Pour with milk, sprinkle Great Grains cereal on yogurt, or snack straight from the box—this heart healthy cereal for adults is a perfect part of breakfast or a midday pick-me-up

GREAT GRAINS CEREAL: Contains no artificial colors, no artificial flavors, just ingredients like real cranberries, almonds, and crunchy flakes and clusters that will make your day not just good, but great
product_description: Enjoy a vibrant start to your day with Great Grains Cranberry Almond Crunch Cereal. This 14 oz box is packed with crispy wheat flakes, real dried cranberries, crunchy granola clusters, and almonds, creating a breakfast cereal that’s bursting with flavor. With 38 grams of whole grain per serving and a good source of fiber, this cranberry cereal helps you feel full longer and supports a heart healthy lifestyle. Each bowl delivers 12 essential vitamins and minerals, fueling your morning with energy and goodness. Great Grains cereal is non-GMO project verified, contains no artificial colors, and is perfect for those seeking healthy snack options. Add bits of this cold cereal to your breakfast smoothie or yogurt cup for extra flavor and crunch. Whether you’re enjoying it as a breakfast cereal or a midday snack, Great Grains Cranberry Almond Crunch delivers the perfect blend of taste and nutrition. Make mornings absolutely delicious and experience the quality and flavor that make Great Grains a favorite among breakfast lovers. Non-GMO Project Verified and a good source of fiber, it’s the heart healthy cereal for adults that makes mornings brighter. Happiness in a box—no compromise, just pure enjoyment!

name: Wheat Chex Breakfast Cereal, Homemade Chex Mix Ingredient, 14 oz
short_description: BREAKFAST CEREAL TO KIDS SNACKS: Crunchy lattice squares made with oven toasted whole grain wheat that seamlessly go from a simple addition to breakfast to snack mix to dessert
DELICIOUSLY EASY RECIPES: A key ingredient in homemade Original Chex Mix and Muddy Buddies; Toss some in your favorite recipes for trail mix, pub mix, party mix, and more
GREAT TASTE: No high fructose corn syrup and no artificial flavors or colors; Good source of 12 vitamins and minerals

WHOLE GRAIN: 52g of whole grain per serving (at least 48g recommended daily); Keep a box of Chex squares in your pantry for a quick breakfast food or recipe ingredient that's ready at a moment's notice
CONTAINS: One 14 oz box of Wheat Chex Cereal
product_description: Product Description Open delicious possibilities with Wheat Chex Cereal! These crunchy lattice squares of oven toasted whole grain wheat easily go from a cereal bowl to a main ingredient in snack recipes. Each serving has 52g whole grain* and no high fructose corn syrup or artificial flavors or colors. It's also a good source of 12 vitamins and minerals. Enjoy tasty versatility by trying this wheat cereal with milk as part of a quick breakfast, or turning it into one of our many Chex mix recipes. Simply combine Wheat Chex with Corn Chex, Rice Chex, pretzels, bagel chips, mixed nuts, and a blend of buttery seasoned goodness in the iconic Original Chex Mix recipe. Chex cereal is also a base for simple dessert recipes the whole family can make. Muddy Buddies is the classic chocolate and peanut butter coated Chex squares that are then covered in powdered sugar. Make Chex squares a crispy ingredient in snacks and party appetizers. Create trail mix for an on the go treat or after school snack. Use the cereal squares in homemade desserts, cereal bars for a kids birthday party, or game day pub mix. From a quick breakfast food to kids snacks to party mix, Wheat Chex is a part of General Mills cereals, known for spreading goodness from tots to grown-ups. *At least 48g recommended daily. Non-GMO Project Verified: Made without the use of bioengineering and use ingredients grown from identity preserved seeds.

VERSATILE & DELICIOUS: Whether you prefer your muesli hot or cold, our muesli is versatile enough to fit any morning routine; use it as a topping for yogurt, mix it into smoothies, or bake it into your favorite granola bars for a nutritious snack

product_description: Old Country Style Muesli is a tasty traditional European-inspired muesli cereal made from a blend of whole grain wheat, rolled oats, raisins, almonds and walnuts. Enjoy cold as a breakfast cereal with milk, hot like oatmeal, or the traditional Swiss way–mixed with yogurt and grated apple and soaked in the refrigerator overnight. Easy to customize to make it truly your favorite meal of the day.

BURSTING WITH FLAVOR: Delicious raisins perfectly balanced with crisp, toasted whole grain wheat and bran flakes in every irresistible spoonful

WHAT YOU GET: Includes one 20.9 oz large-size box of Kellogg's Raisin Bran cereal; Shelf stable; Instant and ready to eat
product_description: Wake up with Sunny and the delicious taste of Kellogg's Raisin Bran, a deliciously crafted breakfast cereal that helps bring energy to start your day. This crunchy cereal is made with toasted whole grain wheat and bran flakes balanced with the sweet taste of sun-ripened raisins in every spoonful. Bursting with delicious flavor, Kellogg's Raisin Bran helps support digestive wellness with high fiber that delivers 26% of the daily value, plus 28g whole grains per serving. Made with 7 simple ingredients, plus iron, it's also a good source of 8 vitamins and minerals. This cereal contains no artificial flavors or colors and is heart healthy (while many factors affect heart disease, diets low in saturated fat and cholesterol may reduce the risk of this disease). It's irresistible in a bowl with dairy milk or oat milk for part of a quick breakfast, sprinkled over yogurt for a sweet snack, or straight from the box. With Kellogg's Raisin Bran cereal, a spoonful goes a long way.

name: Nature's Path Organic Heritage Crunch Cereal, 14 oz (Pack of 1), Non-GMO
short_description: Contains: 1 Box of Nature's Path Heritage Crunch Cereal, 14 ounces

All of our recipes are carefully crafted with only certified USDA organic and Non-GMO ingredients, so that mindful eaters can enjoy a deliciously nutritious breakfast, with no artificial colors, flavors and preservatives
Our ancient grain cereal flake, combined with crunchy granola clusters and lightly sprinkled with cinnamon. Each serve contains 31g whole grains, and a whopping 6g of protein and fiber.
Packed with 6 Ancient Grains, like the high energy khorasan, these important “super grains” offer more in the way of natural nutrition and positive health benefits.
What makes Nature’s Path the best organic cereal? We know how important that crunch is, and our unique and unmatched manufacturing technique, means our cereal stay crunchy, even in milk!
Our planet, our food and our bodies are all connected. Being mindful about your food and choosing to eat organic means you’re making the best choice for your health, and our planet.
product_description: Nature’s Path Heritage Crunch is a mix of our ancient grain cereal flake, combined with crunchy granola clusters and gently sprinkled with cinnamon for a slightly sweet taste. The nutrient-packed flakes were crafted with 6 ancient grains: khorasan wheat, quinoa, millet, spelt, oats and barley. These super grains were carefully chosen to maximize the health benefits of your morning routine. Millet is naturally high in protein and antioxidants and can help improve blood sugar and cholesterol. Quinoa is super high in fiber and helps with digestion. khorasan is an energy grain to help give you a nice mini boost. A single serving comes with 31g of whole grains and 6g of protein. We believe it’s important to start the day right, and that’s why we created this deliciously tasty cereal, filled with simple, whole food, organic and non-GMO ingredients.
